root.name: Ocean Scenes
root.description: Ready for a tropical escape but can't get away? Let Ocean Scenes transform your TV into a window looking in on a virtual vacation.. in the comfort of your own living room! Choose from 18 combinations of scenery. Feel the movement of the waves and listen to the soothing sounds of the ocean. Relax in an ocean view beach house, or out on your own private stateroom balcony on a luxury cruise ship.
